items.sentence: Tom didn\'t tell anyone where he\'d hid the diamonds.
Tom has been arrested and is being held without bail.
Tom has been living with us for the past three years.
Tom has been staying with his grandmother all summer.
Tom has been trying to convince Mary to quit smoking.
Tom has breakfast at the local coffee shop every day.
Tom has completely recovered and can go back to work.
Tom doesn\'t like it when this kind of stuff happens.
Tom is the one who told me that Mary didn\'t like me.
I\'ve lost count of how many times you\'ve helped me.
If my brother hadn\'t helped me, I would\'ve drowned.
If you don\'t have enough money, I\'ll lend you some.
Why didn\'t you tell us you knew how to speak French?
Why don\'t you ask Tom if you can borrow his bicycle?
I think I might join you, but I haven\'t decided yet.
It\'s natural to be nervous when the plane takes off.
Have any of you ever seen something like this before?
They tortured the prisoner first and then killed him.
Why would somebody want to live in a place like this?
Tom wished he\'d put more money into that investment.
